CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Ease_of_Receiving_Refund__c) = "No Effort", 5, IF(TEXT(Ease_of_Receiving_Refund__c) = "Very Easy", 4, IF(TEXT(Ease_of_Receiving_Refund__c) = "Moderately Easy", 3, IF(TEXT(Ease_of_Receiving_Refund__c) = "Average", 2, IF(TEXT(Ease_of_Receiving_Refund__c) = "Difficult", 1, IF(TEXT(Ease_of_Receiving_Refund__c) = "Very Difficult", 0, 0))))))
CustomField.label: Ease of Receiving RefundR
